Equations.Is_Production_Planet: Function_Max_Shipyard_Level.Evaluate * ( Variable_Target.StructureCount {Parameter_Type = "E_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "A_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "T_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "Z_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "R_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "C_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "P_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "U_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "HC_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "M_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} + Variable_Target.StructureCount {Parameter_Type = "E_Ground_Light_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "A_Ground_Light_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "T_Ground_Light_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "Z_Ground_Light_Vehicle_Factory", "E_Ground_Heavy_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "A_Ground_Heavy_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "T_Ground_Heavy_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "Z_Ground_Heavy_Vehicle_Factory", "E_Ground_Advanced_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "A_Ground_Advanced_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "T_Ground_Advanced_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "Z_Ground_Advanced_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "P_Ground_Advanced_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} + clamp(Function_Defense_Level.Evaluate, 0.0, 2.0) ) * (2.0 > Variable_Target.FriendlyForce.GroundTotalUnnormalized {Parameter_Category = GameObjectCategoryType[NonCombatHero]})
